message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this great product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to get a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $125.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm willing to pay, but I still need to save some money. Can you meet me at $115?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can meet you at $127.50.
I'm almost there, but I really need to save some money. Can you meet me at $120?
